tool_description:
API for search and item data from Pinduoduo. 
Pinduoduo API (PDD API) from https://otcommerce.com/pinduoduo-api-dropshipping/
name: Otapi Pinduoduo
title: Otapi Pinduoduo

api_list.name: Get Vendor
Get Catalog
Search for items
api_list.description: Search for Pinduoduo products by title, price, image, orders volume.

api_list.name: Get Item
api_list.description: Get data from Pinduoduo product by Item Id (no SKU data)
